title: MarkDown Translation Tool
description:
We offer two command-line tools:
i18, a MarkDown command-line translation tool & i18n.site, a multi-language static document site generator optimized for reading experience.
The translation perfectly maintains the format of Markdown.
It can identify file modifications and only translates the changed files.
The translated content is editable;If modify original text and perform machine translation again, the manually edited translations will not be overwritten.
